Container.Name: Godaddy-ddns
Container.Overview: Docker image to provide a DDNS service for godaddy domains. Uses the GoDaddy REST API to update the given domain's DNS IP address to the public IP address of the host it is executing on. Performs a check every 10 minutes, but you can alter this if you like by modifying /etc/cron.d/godaddy-ddns inside the container.

Config.Name: Godaddy's API Key
Config.Default: Use the 'key' from your godaddy account
Config.Description: Use the 'key' from your godaddy account

Config.Name: Godaddy's API Secret
Config.Default: Use the 'secret' from your godaddy account
Config.Description: Use the 'secret' from your godaddy account

Config.Name: Domain Name
Config.Description: A comma-separated list of domains that you'd like to update. For example: mydomain.com or mydomain.com,anotherdomain.com
